project.title: Ferro
project.description: Inspired by ferrofluids, Ferro is a virtual reality experience created by Michael Louden and Adam Graham. As a scientist who has discovered a potential gateway into another universe, your job is to channel it to the right frequency. Players use a midi keyboard as the primary input device to initiate the machines and tune the portal.
project.description_short: Ferro is a virtual reality experience inspired by ferrofluids. As a scientist who has discovered a potential gateway into another universe, your job is to channel it to the right frequency using a midi keyboard as the primary input device.
